thread.title: Free recipes from Weber's Big Book of Barbecue
thread.title_full: Free recipes from Weber's Big Book of Barbecue - Telegraph

author: The Telegraph
title: Free recipes from Weber's Big Book of Barbecue
text: We've teamed up with Weber to bring Telegraph readers two 40-page booklets: The Ultimate Barbecue Recipes, packed full of the best barbecue recipes from Weber's Big Book Of Barbecue by Jamie Purviance, free inside The Telegraph on Saturday, August 15 & Sunday, August 16. We've got five more mouthwatering barbecue recipes to offer exclusively to readers, including Moroccan spiced chicken kebabs and sirloin steaks with parmesan-basil crust and garlic butter. To recieve your five free recipes from Weber's Big Book Of Barbecue , click here and fill out your details. Your recipes will be sent to you by email. telegraph.co.uk Follow @telegraph
